// Standard YAML's Core schema. // www.yaml.org/spec/1.2/spec.html#id2804923 // // NOTE: JS-YAML does not support schema-specific tag resolution restrictions. // So, Core schema has no distinctions from JSON schema is JS-YAML.

'use strict';

var Schema = require('../schema');

module.exports = new Schema({

include: [
  require('./json')
]

});
